name: Alien Control
description:
Project originally created for GMTKJam 2020

Scroll down to download Windows Executable

Your aliens have crashed into an unkown planet and lost their controls. Help them to recover their controls and teleport back to their home planet.

Use WASD to Move

Use R to Restart

Use E to throw control (will launch the right control box in the direction the alien is facing to).

Use TAB to switch aliens when there is more than one.

Developed by:

Ben Marquardt https://www.artstation.com/benem

Miguel Sánchez Campillos https://twitter.com/mscampillos // https://toritogames.com/
